name: Prodigy (itch) (CorsaCode, Himeko Katagiri, Goldie)
description:
"June, the star of your art class, is always striving to one up everybody else. At least, that’s what it looks like to you. When you find her in the art studio after hours, June is on the precipice of greatness with only one thing holding her back...

Herself. 

You’ll soon figure out that stars can’t soar on their own for very long, and  this one is about to fall. "

Prodigy was made lovingly by Golden Hour game studio for the O2A2 2022 Game Jam, and completed in 7 days. For more work by our team, refer to the credits below:

  • Director: Goldie Burnett (@gold1efish)
  • Graphic Designer: Samantha Cooke 
  •  Background and Sprite Artist:Goldie Burnett  
  •  Composer: Himeko Katagiri ( Seifuku Sound) (itchio)  
  •  Writer: Goldie Burnett  
  •  Editor: Samantha Cooke 
  •  Programmer: CorsaCode (@CorsaCode)
